--- pam withnall <pwithnall@...> wrote:

> Hi, I've got two tests in one class and want to get
> a value from one
> test to the other.
> I've tried varous things, used this.variable, and
> including accessing
> another class, but cannot get one test to set a
> variable and the other
> to get it.
> Any clues?
> Pam.


Everything I have read sugests that one test should
not be dependent on another test.

Why not just set the variable to what it should be in
test2?

Cheers
Shane
